references.reason: This paper is foundational to Quantum Monte Carlo methods, introducing a technique for solving the many-body Schrödinger equation for bosons.

references.paper_title: Quantum Monte Carlo methods in physics and chemistry
references.reason: This book provides a comprehensive overview of Quantum Monte Carlo methods, covering both theoretical foundations and practical applications.

references.paper_title: Optimizing large parameter sets in variational quantum monte carlo
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenge of optimizing large parameter sets in Variational Quantum Monte Carlo, contributing to more efficient and accurate calculations.

references.paper_title: Deep-neural-network solution of the electronic schrödinger equation
references.reason: This work significantly advanced the field by introducing deep neural networks to solve the electronic Schrödinger equation.
This paper improved upon previous neural network based methods for quantum chemistry calculations, leading to improved accuracy and efficiency.
